solution_line_template: If the art piece was bought at ${initial_price}, and its price in three years will be three times its buying price, it will be worth {price_multiplier}*${initial_price} = ${future_price} in another three years.
The price of the art piece will increase by ${future_price}-${initial_price} = $<<{future_price}-{initial_price}={increase_amount}>>{increase_amount}
